conclusion: The question asks how shadows A, B, C, and D will change when the light source moves to the right.
There are four objects casting shadows on the ground.
When the light source moves to the right, above the objects, the shadows will be cast to the left of the objects.
The size of the shadows will decrease because the light source is moving further away from the objects.
A, B, C, and D will all move to the left and get smaller.
